lore: Sly Marbo is a one-man army. He operates alone, striking from ambush before disappearing back into the shadows. A legendary soldier, Marbo has gutted xenos horrors and slit the throats of traitors beyond count with his envenomed blade, and fires hails of poisoned shards from his ripper pistol.

otherAbilities.name: One-man Army
otherAbilities.description: Each time an enemy unit targets a friendly ASTRA MILITARUM unit within 3'' of this model with ranged attacks, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, this model can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase.

otherAbilities.name: Like Fighting a Shadow
otherAbilities.description: Each time this model has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move as if it were your Movement phase. If it does, until the end of the turn, this model is not eligible to declare a charge.
